alert.note: Alert for Sun Valley Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 1:57PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Nickel sized hail and heavy rainfall will impact portions of north central Blaine County through 245 PM MDT... At 155 PM MDT, the public reported a strong thunderstorm over Ketchum. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Nickel size hail and heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ketchum, Sun Valley, and areas along Warm Springs Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
